nodes.documentation:
@title This is contract for hold all token of users in system
 @author tuanlh
nodes.name: TokenSystem

nodes.documentation:
@notice Constructor to create a TokenSystem
 @dev This contract is deployed by system and only once deploy
 set Granularity is the minimum transferable chunk
 Or it is the minimum value of wei corresponds to a token
 Or it is price of token
 1 token = mGranularity (wei)
 Set admin = msg.sender (runner contract)

@dev granularity can be understood as the price of a token. 1 token = granularity form as wei
 @return the granularity of the token
nodes.name: granularity
balances
getBalance

devdoc.author: tuanlh

balances(address).details: Get token of user without campaigns

params._addr: is address of user that you want check token

constructor.details: This contract is deployed by system and only once deploy set Granularity is the minimum transferable chunk Or it is the minimum value of wei corresponds to a token Or it is price of token 1 token = mGranularity (wei) Set admin = msg.sender (runner contract)

deposit().details: This function will receive balance that user send into contract and store in contract value will be stored in the mBalances variable Amount is msg.value form as Wei (1 ETH = 10^18 wei)

getMyBalance().details: Call function getBalance() with params is msg.sender

granularity().details: granularity can be understood as the price of a token. 1 token = granularity form as wei

isAdmin(address).details: This function is called by a contract to verify address of sender

params._addr: is address that you want to check

updateCampaignAddr(address).details: This function add address of campaign contract

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw token in system to ETH. (Wei = token * mGranularity)

params._amountToken: number of token that you want withdraw amount of token MUST be multiple with mGranularity before send

withdrawFromCampaign(uint256,address,uin.details: This function MUST be run by a contract

params._tokenCollected: total token was sold in campaign

devdoc.title: This is contract for hold all token of users in system

deposit().notice: Allow user transfer balances to this contract

getBalance(address).notice: get my balance (form as Token) of msg.sender with campaign

withdraw(uint256).notice: This function allow user withdraw balances in contract to ETH

withdrawFromCampaign(uint256,address,uin.notice: Allow campaign owner (startups) can withdraw token from a succeed campaign
